headline: American Express Company (AXP): A Hidden Gem in the World of Cheap Dividend Stocks
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is included among the 13 Incredibly Cheap Dividend Stocks to Invest in. American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is one of the most well-known payment card brands, both in the US and globally. The company has built a massive customer base and operates a business that remains reliably profitable and steadily expanding. Every […]

headline: American Express Reveals New Platinum Card Retail and Wellness Benefits, Revamps Amex App
summary: The credit card company has unveiled its newest benefits, including Lululemon, Oura alongside Saks and Walmart partnerships for its premium U.S. consumer card.

headline: Evaluating Cardlytics (CDLX) Valuation After Citron Spotlights Bank Integrations and Amex Platinum Refresh
summary: Cardlytics (CDLX) has landed back in the spotlight after a prominent Citron Research tweet connected the company to American Express’s Platinum card refresh. Citron’s note pointed out Cardlytics’ existing integrations with banking giants such as American Express, Chase, and Bank of America. This signals that the company could be well placed to leverage new opportunities arising from these partnerships. With the American Express update focused on expanded, merchant-specific rewards, investors...

headline: At the Airport, There’s a Fancy New Lounge Everywhere You Look
summary: Airlines and credit-card companies are taking over terminals with ever-swankier amenities, and loyal customers can’t get enough.

headline: The Amex Platinum Card's $200 annual fee increase is steep — but not as divisive as Chase Sapphire Reserve's
summary: The Amex Platinum Card's annual fee increase hasn't stoked the online outrage seen from the Chase Sapphire Reserve's. The new benefits seem worth it.
